subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal lost to Fernando Verdasco, 6-3, 3-6, 7-5, on Thursday at the Madrid Open and threatened not to return if officials keep the new blue-clay court.
snippet: Rafael Nadal lost to Fernando Verdasco, 6-3, 3-6, 7-5, on Thursday at the Madrid Open and threatened not to return if officials keep the new blue-clay court.
